It‚Äôs time to dance to Baby Shark! Let‚Äôs try making sharks using hands and arms! Use your fingers to make little Baby Shark! Open your hands to make Mommy Shark! Spread your arms wide to make Daddy Shark! Let‚Äôs not forget Grandma and Grandpa Shark! Doo doo doo doo doo doo! The dance will help children develop fine motor skills as they have fun!

Grandpa shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Grandpa shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Grandpa shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Grandpa shark!
Let‚Äôs go hunt, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Let‚Äôs go hunt, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Let‚Äôs go hunt, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Let‚Äôs go hunt!

Safe at last, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Safe at last, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Safe at last, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Safe at last!

video:video.video:description: Dr. Moeed Yusuf, the Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on National Security said that India was behind the terrorist attacks in Pakistan.

video:video.video:description: A Pakistani woman named Daphia Bai was separated from her family from India during the partition in 1947 and a YouTuber reunited her with her loved ones.
